Room.Name: Limbo
Room.Description: You are floating in a formless void, detached from all sensation of physical matter, surrounded by swirling glowing light, which fades into the relative darkness around you without any trace of edges or shadow. There is a "No Tipping" notice pinned to the darkness.

Room.Name: Graelik's Lair
Room.Description: As you look around, you can't make out much of anything. The air is completely dark. However, a rich smell of acid overcomes you as a small drop hits your arm causing your skin to burn slightly.

NPC.name: massive lich
NPC.longDescription: A massive lich stands here holding a potion, offering to sell you a way out.

NPC.name: trogdor burninator dragon
NPC.longDescription: Trogdor the Burninator is here burninating everything!

Item.LongDescription: One miserable silver coin.

Item.Name: graelik throne
Item.LongDescription: Here is Graelik's throne, you would be well advised not to sit in it.
